about_the_game:
Lux is a 2D platformer that follows Lou, a girl who discovers a magic lantern in her attic. Full of quirky characters and a whole lot of puns, explore the town of Idelham, and discover the darkness that lurks under the surface.

This demo features:
- Lots of silly jokes
- Ton of fun local characters (including many OCs designed by our community!)
- Unfolding story
- Basic platforming
- Gorgeous frame by frame animation and carefully done background art
